description_txt: stated on June 4, 2012 in a campaign video:
quote_txt: "Marcy Kaptur voted against a ban which would have prevented the aborting of a baby girl for the sole reason that she's a girl."

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2012 in in a tweet.:
quote_txt: Says "only 18 percent of Portland elementary schools have art instruction compared to 83 percent nationally."

description_txt: stated on June 4, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "Romney outsourced call center jobs to India."

description_txt: stated on June 8, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: As governor of Massachusetts, "Romney reduced unemployment to just 4.7 percent."

description_txt: stated on May 28, 2012 in a speech.:
quote_txt: Virginia "is home to more veterans per capita than any state in America."

description_txt: stated on May 24, 2012 in a PAC website.:
quote_txt: Says Jeff Wentworth, bending the rules, "has used $211,743.96 in campaign contributions to lease luxury cars."

description_txt: stated on March 21, 2012 in an interview:
quote_txt: "Minnesota has passed and Indiana has passed" right to work laws making union membership and dues optional

description_txt: stated on June 6, 2012 in a town hall meeting:
quote_txt: "When I was U.S. Attorney we wound up putting 10 percent of the state Legislature in jail during my seven years."

description_txt: stated on May 23, 2012 in a television interview:
quote_txt: A new manufacturing plant is slated to create about 3,000 jobs in central and northeast Georgia and "create about a $3 billion infusion" into the economy.

description_txt: stated on June 1, 2012 in a press release.:
quote_txt: The United States has experienced "40 straight months of unemployment at 8 percent or higher."

description_txt: stated on June 3, 2012 in an appearance on NBC's "Meet the Press.":
quote_txt: "When I started in Ohio it was terrible. Now, we’re getting bipartisan support for our bills. And that’s called leadership."

description_txt: stated on May 30, 2012 in a memo to the media:
quote_txt: Says "Tommy Thompson's tax plan amounts to an average tax cut of almost $87,000 for the top 1 percent."

description_txt: stated on May 7, 2012 in a speech on the Senate floor.:
quote_txt: Says "we are overcharging students . . . to help pay for the health care law."

description_txt: stated on May 24, 2012 in a debate on State of the State:
quote_txt: "Massachusetts is reporting a trend far below the national trend in the escalation of health-care costs in this year."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • June 10, 2012

description_txt: stated on October 22, 2011 in a speech.:
quote_txt: Says combined inflation and unemployment rates in October 2011 were the highest since Ronald Reagan succeeded Jimmy Carter.

description_txt: stated on June 8, 2012 in remarks to Hispanic Caucus at Texas Democratic Party convention in Houston.:
quote_txt: Says Democratic runoff opponent Grady Yarbrough twice previously ran statewide as a Republican.

description_txt: stated on May 31, 2012 in an interview with the editorial board of 'The Telegraph.':
quote_txt: "We spend in tax loopholes annually $1.1 trillion. That's more than we spend on our defense budget in a year, on Medicare or Medicaid in a year."

description_txt: stated on June 5, 2012 in a Web ad:
quote_txt: "More Hispanics have fallen into poverty under Obama."

description_txt: stated on June 4, 2012 in a television ad:
quote_txt: "When Mitt Romney was governor, Massachusetts lost 40,000 manufacturing jobs, a rate twice the national average."

description_txt: stated on May 11, 2012 in a debate.:
quote_txt: "In Galveston, Texas, they have allowed people to privatize part of their Social Security. And people are building wealth."

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2012 in a speech to the Republican Party of Texas convention in Fort Worth.:
quote_txt: Says Barack Obama has played nearly 100 rounds of golf as president.

description_txt: stated on June 2, 2012 in a video posted on YouTube:
quote_txt: "It took us four years to balance the budget. Then I gave you four surplus budgets for the first time in more than 70 years, paid $600 billion down on the national debt."

description_txt: stated on June 5, 2012 in an Austin appearance with Wes Riddle, fellow GOP hopeful for US House.:
quote_txt: Says Barack Obama is a socialist.

description_txt: stated on May 10, 2010 in pledge:
quote_txt: On opposing any and all efforts to increase taxes.

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2012 in campaign website:
quote_txt: Says "As Mayor of Wilsonville, I drove TriMet out of town and replaced their bloated transit system with our own local bus line that offers better service and has saved our businesses millions of dollars."

description_txt: stated on April 1, 2012 in e-mail messages circulating on the Internet:
quote_txt: Says Hawaii Gov. Neil Abercrombie made a late-night visit to Kinko’s to forge President Barack Obama’s birth certificate two days before Obama unveiled it to the media.

description_txt: stated on May 29, 2012 in a press conference:
quote_txt: Florida election officials’ requests to some residents to submit proof of citizenship is a "backdoor poll tax."

description_txt: stated on May 24, 2012 in an interview.:
quote_txt: Homosexual behavior "cuts your life by about 20 years."

description_txt: stated on June 4, 2012 in a column on Blue Jersey:
quote_txt: Says PolitiFact "listed Governor Scott Walker of Wisconsin as the Governor who told the most lies" and "our own ‘untruthful’ Governor Chris Christie made it into Politifact's top five of ‘Lie - en Governors’."

description_txt: stated on May 31, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: "There is no record of congresswoman Betty Sutton ... ever holding a single in-person town hall meeting open to the general public."
